page.title: 07FARMING/HOME LIFE
page.content: Rabbits can be a nuisance causing damage to crops. Pentland Garden Centre-Mr Spray owns pentland garden centre.It covers approx 2 acres.There is one glass house and 8 polythine tunnels where plants are grown from seed.In winter when it is quiet 6 people are employed in spring it becomes very busy as many as 20 people may be employed.The garden centre not only caters for passing trade but supplies stores and smaller garden centres. Homelife-I am called Joanna Ward.I live in Roslin,a very quiet village outside Edinburgh.You can go walks to the Glen near Roslin.I think my mum and dad like living here better than in the city.I like to go cycling with my family.Find it very easy to make good friends.I likethe people at my school.Soon I shall be going to
